amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that States maintain the ability to issue their own stream buffer rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 139).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 139).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
